casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin WILSON, Jr. No. 27P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of December 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Writ of Certiorari and/or Other Available Relief Pursuant to the All Writs Act":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
